scripts.postinstall: npm run rebuild-exiv2 && npm run rebuild-sqlite3 && npm run rebuild-udev && npm run rebuild-sharp && npm run rebuild-libraw && ./node_modules/.bin/electron-rebuild
scripts.rebuild-libraw: cd node_modules/libraw && node-gyp configure --module_name=libraw --module_path=../lib/binding/electron-v1.4-linux-x64 && node-gyp rebuild --target=1.4.13 --arch=x64 --target_platform=linux --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=libraw --module_path=../lib/binding/electron-v1.4-linux-x64
scripts.rebuild-sharp: cd node_modules/sharp && node-gyp configure --module_name=sharp --module_path=../lib/binding/electron-v1.4-linux-x64 && node-gyp rebuild --target=1.4.13 --arch=x64 --target_platform=linux --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=sharp --module_path=../lib/binding/electron-v1.4-linux-x64
scripts.rebuild-udev: cd node_modules/udev && node-gyp configure --module_name=udev --module_path=../lib/binding/electron-v1.4-linux-x64 && node-gyp rebuild --target=1.4.13 --arch=x64 --target_platform=linux --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=udev --module_path=../lib/binding/electron-v1.4-linux-x64
scripts.rebuild-exiv2: cd node_modules/exiv2 && node-gyp configure --module_name=exiv2 --module_path=../lib/binding/electron-v1.4-linux-x64 && node-gyp rebuild --target=1.4.13 --arch=x64 --target_platform=linux --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=exiv2 --module_path=../lib/binding/electron-v1.4-linux-x64
scripts.rebuild-sqlite3: cd node_modules/sqlite3 && npm run prepublish && node-gyp configure --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/electron-v1.4-linux-x64 && node-gyp rebuild --target=1.4.13 --arch=x64 --target_platform=linux --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/electron-v1.4-linux-x64
